name: AutoCorrect List File
summary: Learn about .ACL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Typically, one global AutoCorrect list is created per language for each user. Changes made in one Office program affect all other Office applications.

description: Stores a list of corrections used by the AutoCorrect feature in Microsoft Office programs; used for automatically correcting grammar and spelling mistakes; AutoCorrect lists can be customized within Microsoft Office programs and are not meant to be edited manually.
